title: Review: The Black Keys-Tighten Up
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/blackkey2.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/blackkey2.jpg)

At their best **The Black Keys** are the pioneers of modern blues, at their worst simply derivative throwbacks to a kinder era. Thankfully their new single _‘Tighten Up’_ falls under the former, seeing them return to form. The sound is remarkably cleaner, gone is the typical **Black Keys** gravel, in its place is a more soulful groove filled sound. **Dan Auerbach’s** voice as always is agonisingly passionate and moulds perfectly with the new direction. Although a new direction for the band _‘Tighten Up’_ is by no means revolutionary, however the catchy and of course passionate sound will still have you tapping your foot.
